overview: An Islamic romance film about a man who goes on a journey to heal his broken heart after his wife's death. When Attar loses his wife Saidatul Nafisa, it feels as if his world has shattered. After much contemplation, he decides to make a pilgrimage to Makkah, in hopes that God will show him the way out of his depression.
tagline: Di situ letaknya kekuatan cinta [ In it lies the power of love]
title: 99 Kali Rindu
